info.name: Hello Kitty Halloween witch animation [Tumblr toy]
info.description:
Hello Kitty possesses your avatar and flies away into the night. "Eee, hee hee hee!"

(Yes, I know, Hello Kitty doesn't talk, much less cackle. I was extemporizing.)
info.additionalInfo: Don't touch Kitty or she'll disappear. You've been warned.
